constantValues: Collateral entity represents the collateral information related to a commercial loan product that the customer holds with the bank.

definitions.description: Collateral entity represents the collateral information related to a commercial loan product that the customer holds with the bank.

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the entity with respect to the base currency.

members.description: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the entity with respect to the base currency.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

members.name: collateralType

constantValues: Type of collateral provided by the client as security against the loan.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'collateralType_display' is added to the 'Collateral' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'collateralType'
addSupportingAttribute.name: collateralType_display

members.description: Type of collateral provided by the client as security against the loan.

members.name: collateralValue

constantValues: The value of the collateral as per the evaluation done.

members.description: The value of the collateral as per the evaluation done.

members.name: collateralValueBase

constantValues: Value of the Collateral Value in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Collateral Value in base currency.

members.name: coverage

constantValues: The amount of the loan that is secured/covered by the specified collateral.

members.description: The amount of the loan that is secured/covered by the specified collateral.

members.name: dateOfValuation

constantValues: The date on which the collateral was evaluated/appraised.

members.description: The date on which the collateral was evaluated/appraised.

members.name: evaluatedBy

constantValues: The name of the firm that evaluated/appraised the collateral.

members.description: The name of the firm that evaluated/appraised the collateral.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: financialProductId

constantValues: Reference to the loan product for which the collateral is defined.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Reference to the loan product for which the collateral is defined.

members.name: name

constantValues: The name of the custom entity.

members.description: The name of the custom entity.

members.name: nextDateOfValuation

constantValues: The date on which the collateral needs to be re-evaluated.

members.description: The date on which the collateral needs to be re-evaluated.

members.name: processId

constantValues: Contains the id of the process associated with the entity.

members.description: Contains the id of the process associated with the entity.

members.name: deprecatedStageId

constantValues: Contains the id of the stage where the entity is located.

members.description: Contains the id of the stage where the entity is located.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'stateCode_display' is added to the 'Collateral' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'stateCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: stateCode_display

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

members.name: statusCode

constantValues: Reason for the status of the Collateral

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statusCode_display' is added to the 'Collateral' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statusCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: statusCode_display

members.description: Reason for the status of the Collateral

foreignKeyAttribute.name: transactionCurrencyId

constantValues: Unique identifier of the currency associated with the entity.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the currency associated with the entity.

members.name: deprecatedTraversedPath

constantValues: A comma separated list of string values representing the unique identifiers of stages in a Business Process Flow Instance in the order that they occur.

members.description: A comma separated list of string values representing the unique identifiers of stages in a Business Process Flow Instance in the order that they occur.
